content.rendered:
Legal Notice

Get Started

Understanding Legal Notices in Intellectual Property (IP) Services with Trademark India.

What is a Legal Notice in IP Services?

Legal Notice in IP services is a formal notification made in the interests of the protection of intellectual property rights. It is used as a notice or communication to an individual or organization to notify him or their that the use of his or its trademark, copyright, patent or trade secret has been infringed. The task of the legal notice is to warn the recipient of the violation and request that it cease, within the stipulated time, failing which legal action may be taken.

The Importance of Issuing a Legal Notice in IP Services

Sending a Legal Notice in the IP services sector is essential because it creates a legal record of your hostility toward the infringement of your IP assets. It shows that you are not conceding your rights this is important if the issue goes to the court of law. However, it can also affect cooperation and sometimes provide a mechanism for resolving disputes that do not reach the courtroom level which would save time and costs.

How We Can Assist with Legal Notices in IP Services

We focus on drafting and sending clear and efficient Legal Notices. Our team of lawyers make sure that the notice you give is in line with existing laws on I.P. and makes sure your demands are well captured. Employing our services to handle your legal notice means that you can concentrate on your business as we protect your patents.

Book your free legal consultation today!
